text:
Please read this policy carefully: it outlines what information we access, why, and how we treat it.
We collect limited information from our site via Cookies - please read our Cookie Policy.
We use this information to improve our analytics, personalize the product, and enhance the app functionality.
We use this information to improve the performance of the app and its features and services.

privacy policy

ATKAIROS LIMITED (" we ", " us " or " our ") is the data controller and is responsible for your personal data.
We use cookies to personalize content, run ads, and analyze traffic.
Clicking on those links or enabling those connections may allow third parties to collect or share data about you.
With the data collected from Apple Health, we provide personalized recommendations and suggestions to optimize how you organize your day.
Other key points : We'll only retain personal data for 2 years unless we're legally obliged to keep it longer.
